description: Tyler Michael's card is simple enough: 'Fuck your best friend', so he invites his good pal, Mustang Exclusive Cal 'Speedy' Reynolds over on the pretense of watching the game and guzzling down a few beers. Watching all that man-on-man contact soon has these buddies all fired up and things get rough and rowdy from there.
title: Brawlers, Scene #01
